entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
